item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness, and many of our people need it sorely on these accounts. Broad, wholesome, charitable views of men and things cannot be acquired by vegetating in one little corner of the earth all one's lifetime." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Jose Marti
item.description: "The truthe wakes up once and never dies." -- Jose Marti

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Love is the only rational act." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Auden
item.description: "Love each other or perish" -- Auden

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Kabir
item.description: "The river that flows in you also flows in me." -- Kabir

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "You have to take risks, he said. We will only understand the miracle of life fully when we allow the unexpected to happen. Every day, God gives us the sun--and also one moment in which we have the ability to change everything that makes us unhappy. Every day, we try to pretend that we haven't perceived that moment, that it doesn't exist--that today is the same as yesterday and will be the same as tomorrow. But if people really pay attention to their everyday lives, they will discover that magic moment. It may arrive in the instant when we are doing something mundane, like putting our front-door key in the lock; it may lie hidden in the quiet that follows the lunch hour or in the thousand and one things that all seem the same to us. But that moment exists--a moment when all the power of the stars becomes a part of us and enables us to perform miracles." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it." -- Rumi

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "A poet is someone who can pour light into a cup, then raise it to nourish your beautiful parched, holy mouth." -- Hafiz

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Look for God. Look for God like a man with his head on fire looks for water." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "In the end, though, maybe we must all give up trying to pay back the people in this world who sustain our lives. In the end, maybe it's wiser to surrender before the miraculous scope of human generosity and to just keep saying thank you, forever and sincerely, for as long as we have voices." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Nicole Krauss
item.description: "Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering." -- Nicole Krauss

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "Be nobody's darling; Be an outcast. Take the contradictions Of your life And wrap around You like a shawl, To parry stones To keep you warm. " -- Alice Walker

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "I have learned not to worry about love; but to honor its coming with all my heart." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "Never offer your heart to someone who eats hearts who finds heartmeat delicious but not rare who sucks the juices drop by drop and bloody-chinned grins like a God." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "The nature of this flower is to bloom." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by alice walker
item.description:
"Expect nothing. Live frugally On surprise. become a stranger To need of pity Or, if compassion be freely Given out Take only enough Stop short of urge to plead Then purge away the need.
Wish for nothing larger Than your own small heart Or greater than a star; Tame wild disappointment With caress unmoved and cold Make of it a parka For your soul.
Discover the reason why So tiny human midget Exists at all So scared unwise But expect nothing. Live frugally On surprise." -- alice walker

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Victoria Moran
item.description: "In this moment, there is plenty of time. In this moment, you are precisely as you should be. In this moment, there is infinite possibility. (17)" -- Victoria Moran

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Victoria Moran
item.description: "[T[his isn’t just “another day, another dollar.” It’s more like “another day, another miracle.” (213)" -- Victoria Moran

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Alfred Tennyson
item.description: "I will drink life to the lees." -- Alfred Tennyson

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by August Wilson
item.description: "Confront the dark parts of yourself, and work to banish them with illumination and forgiveness. Your willingness to wrestle with your demons will cause your angels to sing." -- August Wilson

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Conan O'Brien
item.description: "If you work really hard, and you're kind, amazing things will happen." -- Conan O'Brien

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by William Wordsworth
item.description: "The best portion of a good man's life: his little, nameless unremembered acts of kindness and love." -- William Wordsworth

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "What you seek is seeking you." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion." -- Rumi

item.title: Sweet pea add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?" -- Rumi
